title.rendered: Posy  | Discovering the timeless charms of Posy

content.rendered:
POSY FLOWERS 

Discovering the timeless charms of posy.

 

 

 

OUR SIGNATURE POSIES

 

 

 

 

 

 

In the enchanting world of floral arrangements, the terms “posy” and “bouquet” are often used interchangeably, but each holds a distinct charm that sets them apart.

At LULLY & ROSE, our affection for posies runs deep, as they not only exhibit the sheer beauty of fresh flowers but also tell a story of tradition and elegance. Our dedication to the creation of posy design goes beyond aesthetics; it’s a commitment to preserving the timeless allure of flower arrangements as a means of conveying emotions and sentiments.

 

 

POSY VS BOUQUET

The subtle yet impactful difference between a posy and a bouquet lies in the intentional curation of a posy’s petite and tightly packed design. We thoughtfully arranged to capture the essence of a moment, reflecting the care and attention we pour into every design. While bouquets exude grandeur with their traditionally front faced design, our posies embody a more intimate form of floral expression, designed to create a lasting impression.

LULLY & ROSE SIGNATURE POSIES

When gifting with LULLY & ROSE, it’s not just about presenting a bouquet of flowers; it’s a gesture reserved for true lovers of floral artistry and the individual uniqueness of each flower. A LULLY & ROSE posy is a thoughtful expression of appreciation for the recipient’s taste and love for the intricate details that make each floral special. It’s a gift that celebrates the transient beauty of nature and the joy that comes from savouring the fleeting moments of each blooming season.

Our passion for posies is not merely about assembling flowers; it’s a celebration of the rich floral traditions that have transcended time and cultures. From Victorian symbolism to the vibrant fields of New Zealand countryside, our posies are a testament to the diverse inspirations that shape our designs. 

ENGLISH GARDEN INSPIRATION

In our commitment to preserving the essence of posies, we draw inspiration from the timeless beauty of English gardens, boasting a bountiful bunch of delicately arranged garden flowers. Despite their petite size, these florals make a bold statement with a abundant mix of seasonal flower varieties. The tightly packed florals capture the essence of English gardens, inviting you to revel in the beauty of nature’s bounty.

TRADITIONAL INSIGHTS TO FRESH FLOWER POSIES

Fresh flower posies have a rich tradition, often symbolising love, gratitude, as well as well-wishing. In Victorian times, they were exchanged to convey sentiments and secret messages, with each flower carrying its own meaning. At LULLY & ROSE, we embrace this tradition, infusing each with intention and emotion. Beyond their visual beauty, they serve as delicate messengers, carrying the language of flowers into the present day. Whether it’s a gesture of affection, such as a token of appreciation, or a heartfelt wish. We thoughtfully make our posies to encapsulate the sentiments embedded in the historical roots of floral exchange. 

PERFUMED FLORAL NOTES

One cannot talk about posies without acknowledging their perfumed floral notes. We carefully design our signature posies with fragrant flowers wherever possible, creating a sensory experience that goes beyond their visual beauty. Additionally, the delightful scents of delicate flowers reflect our dedication to providing a complete and immersive encounter with nature. As their soft notes fill the air, they bring back memories, evoke emotions, as well as enhance the appeal. It’s more than just a bunch of flowers; it’s a fragrant journey through a garden of emotions, leaving a lasting impression

 

 

In the world of flowers, posies stand as a timeless expression of beauty, tradition, as well as sentiment. At LULLY & ROSE, we hold a deep appreciation for the artistry and symbolism of posies, which is why our flower arrangements pay homage to this cherished tradition. Posies are much more than just a bouquet of flowers—they’re a symbol of tradition, beauty, and sentiment. At LULLY & ROSE, we’re proud to carry on this tradition by curating posies that capture the essence of natural beauty and timeless elegance. So the next time you’re in need of a meaningful gift or simply want to treat yourself to something special, consider sending a posy from LULLY & ROSE.
